item.title: By: Mum & Dad
item.dc:creator: Mum & Dad
item.description: <p>photos look excellent. Good to hear that everyone's well. We're in the mountains north of Jo'berg until tomorrow evening - then back to the cold on Wednesday morning! Safari was amazing - we saw 4 of the 'big 5' - elephant, lion, buffalo, rhino - but no leopard. All terribly refined with aircon, minibar etc in each mud hut. Love to all.</p>
item.content:encoded: photos look excellent. Good to hear that everyone’s well. We’re in the mountains north of Jo’berg until tomorrow evening – then back to the cold on Wednesday morning! Safari was amazing – we saw 4 of the ‘big 5’ – elephant, lion, buffalo, rhino – but no leopard. All terribly refined with aircon, minibar etc in each mud hut. Love to all.

item.title: By: si & fi
item.dc:creator: si & fi
item.description: <p>Hi there Matthew! We are safely settlet into our lovely hotel in NY - it is close to everything and we're just off to the Grammy Awards at Madison Sqaure Gardens - star spotting for the first time. On Tuesday we're off to Broadway to see Cabaret (starring Molly Ringwald and TVs Dougie Howser MD!!). Then Wednesday we're being taken out on the town by some friends of friends. Finally we're rounding events off with Ice Hockey on Thursday - NY Rangers V Boston. Take care and don't be so modest about your camera skills - all the pics have been great! xx</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi there Matthew! We are safely settlet into our lovely hotel in NY – it is close to everything and we’re just off to the Grammy Awards at Madison Sqaure Gardens – star spotting for the first time. On Tuesday we’re off to Broadway to see Cabaret (starring Molly Ringwald and TVs Dougie Howser MD!!). Then Wednesday we’re being taken out on the town by some friends of friends. Finally we’re rounding events off with Ice Hockey on Thursday – NY Rangers V Boston. Take care and don’t be so modest about your camera skills – all the pics have been great! xx

item.title: By: Matt & Judith
item.dc:creator: Matt & Judith
item.description: <p>What lovely pic's look like you're having a fab holiday, p.s message to mum don't worry uncle kev's stuff is all here & safe. Sounds like everyone's having fun and enjoying there time away, si & Fi enjoy your break and look forward to seeing you soon. It's just matt & I here in england no I think!! wish we were with you all, and looking forward to seeing mum and dad again. Take care keep in touch</p>
item.content:encoded: What lovely pic’s look like you’re having a fab holiday, p.s message to mum don’t worry uncle kev’s stuff is all here & safe. Sounds like everyone’s having fun and enjoying there time away, si & Fi enjoy your break and look forward to seeing you soon. It’s just matt & I here in england no I think!! wish we were with you all, and looking forward to seeing mum and dad again. Take care keep in touch
